name: piyipi
description:
This is a simple RPG

Luban's father was determined to take revenge.

So he embarked on the road of revenge.

on the way,

You can upgrade and get money by killing monsters

Make good use of the money, in the equipment manufacturer's office

You can buy equipment and medicine

When you're strong enough

You can challenge the final boss

Monsters only appear on field maps. There are no monsters in the city.

Monsters don't appear on the map. Walking on the road can cause a fight

As long as the purchase of equipment can easily pass
